name: node-security
description: Security with Node.js/Express: Tips and Best Practices

scripts.start: reveal-md  --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --title node-security --css styles.css --port 1337 --scripts custom.js presentation.md

scripts.pdf: reveal-md  --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --scripts custom.js --css styles.css README.md --print presentation.pdf
